result.arabic_text: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ
result.translation: 47.Tokkel Nabiyow Yalli isi xaganay isi farmoytit catuwaah ken dirabboyse mara finqisu waamah hee xagana maku waam makkalin, diggah Yalli mayso li isi naqboytiitil cañé gacse kinni.
